Headline: Temporary Northbound #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Reroute near South Blvd/Ridgeland
ShortDescription:
Northbound 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via due to, 
 near South Blvd/Ridgeland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via South Blvd, Scoville, Lake, Ridgeland, and resume normal route due to street blockage near South Blvd/Ridgeland.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line trains bypassing Roosevelt Station
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Roosevelt due to a sick customer.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Roosevelt due to a sick customer.

  • For Howard-bound service to this station, take a Howard-bound train to Cermak-Chinatown where you may take the #29 State Street bus to reach Roosevelt.

Shuttle buses are available between Fullerton and State/Lake to provide connecting service.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
